title: Stablecoin Adoption Could Stifle Central Bank Control, IMF Warns
description: Stablecoins have the potential to broaden individuals’ access to financial services, but that may come at the cost of central banks, per IMF.
content:
In brief
  • Stablecoins could make monetary policy less effective in some nations, the IMF said.
  • The organization pointed to stablecoins ability to penetrate an economy.
  • So far,… [+3458 chars]
